value.query: SELECT Id, OrderNumber, Account.Name,Status, Account.Id, %vlocity_namespace%__TrackingNumber__c, Account.%vlocity_namespace%__PrimaryContactId__c, TrackingStatus__c, %vlocity_namespace%__OriginatingChannel__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Account.RecordType.Name, Account.ParentId FROM Order WHERE OwnerId='{{$root.UserId}}'
